next_window: Watch for a potential retest of Pivot R1 at 144.1823, which could extend to 144.3414 if DXY remains stable or strengthens.
summary: Given the stable close of the DXY and its proximity to Pivot R1, combined with USD/JPY closing near its high, a long position is favored. DXY strength supports USD/JPY longs, suggesting upward momentum may continue.
